thread.title: Here’s Your Chance to Be Featured on Highsnobiety & Snobshots for Nike Air Max Day 2017
thread.title_full: Here’s Your Chance to Be Featured on Highsnobiety & Snobshots for Nike Air Max Day 2017

author: Aaron Howes
title: Here’s Your Chance to Be Featured on Highsnobiety & Snobshots for Nike Air Max Day 2017
text:
Nike Air Max couldn’t have built its iconic legacy without bold characters making the designs their own and interpreting them in ways that inspired the rest. In the build up to Air Max Day 2017 , we want to share the work of modern individuals who are pushing boundaries and influencing others.
Highsnobiety and Nike invite you to join Snobshots — our global community of forward-thinking creatives — so that together we can continue to inspire the next generation. Your role is simple:
We’ll be curating our favorite Nike Air Max images from around the world to feature on the Snobshots Instagram page as well as the Highsnobiety Instagram channel. Closer to Air Max Day (March 26, FYI) we’ll be sharing the best of the best on highsnobiety.com.
Snobshots is a community of individuals out to achieve what the original Air Max and its successors have been doing since 1987. It’s a community charged network of creative innovators shaping the future of fashion, design and culture by sharing their unique perspectives and individuality.
If you need some inspiration, scroll through some of the hottest Snobshots from recent weeks below before you get shooting and sharing.
#snobshots @4.kuttaz
